name: NCDHC OperationDefination $document
purpose: To allow client system to access custom view generated from multiple sources
comment: This custom FHIR operation will be used to get access to the view generated from multiple sources.

parameter.name: includeSourceDocument
parameter.documentation: This parameter instruct the FHIR server to include the reference of source FHIR document corresponding to each section

parameter.name: includeSourceQuestionnaire
parameter.documentation: This parameter instruct the FHIR server to include the Questionnaire associated with each section

parameter.name: type
parameter.documentation: type code to instruct the FHIR server which type of view needs to be generated
